meanings.definition: To sit or stand with a leg on each side of
meanings.sent1: The cowboy would bestride the horse before riding off into the sunset.
meanings.sent2: She confidently bestrides the bicycle as she pedals down the street.
meanings.sent3: The clown tried to bestride two unicycles at once, but it ended in a comical tumble.
meanings.sent4: His influence seemed to bestride the entire town, casting a long shadow over all.
meanings.sent5: The image of the knight bestriding his mighty steed is etched in my memory.
